review: works great but I will have to get better internet services to make it work better.

review: picture is always jittery and no matter what i try it does not go away, tried trouble shooting and look online problem will not go away, I have apple tv never a problem with play back.
author: Sandy R. Bruce

review: Great little device for the traveler!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Really did not have any expectations when I purchased. I was just looking for some cheap way to watch "Game of Thrones". I don't have and will not have cable or satellite again, do to the cost and treatment from the companies. Bought the 3 months of "Sling TV" and "HBO" and got the "Fire TV Stick" free, at the end of the 3 month chances are I will drop "HBO" then decide whether to keep "Sling"
author: Keith Emerson Sr

review: A little trouble getting started but found out it was on my end.  We are just now getting used to using it.
author: Dan Billington
